response.overview: Norma wants out. She's been preoccupied, ruminating about her many exes, but she's finally ready to move on from them. All she has to do is destroy the photos she keeps of them locked away in a safe. The problem? Her last boyfriend, Théo, had discovered the photos and in a fit of jealousy, swallowed the key. Norma knows what she has to do. Digging through the night, she unearths bodies of boyfriends she murdered and buried in her backyard. Kymani, Gustav and Vishal, now corpses, awaken and sort out their unfinished business. They're a Greek chorus in her journey to both literally and figuratively process the past and put it to rest. By daybreak, she finds Théo and searches for the key in his stomach. She finds her key and her closure and the discovery that Théo, even though a half rotted corpse, is the man of her dreams. NORMA is a fantastical, dark comedy horror with romance!
response.title: Norma
